Class RollResult

java.lang.Object
RollResult
public class RollResult extends Object
A class used to represent an outcome of a roll, returned by RollInterpreter
Author:
Hans de los Santos

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    RollResult(boolean win, boolean lose, String condition)
    Instantiates a RollResult object with no score
    RollResult(boolean win, boolean lose, String condition, int score)
    Instantiates a RollResult object with a score

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    getCondition()
    Returns the outcome of the roll represented in a String (triples, four-five-six, one-two-three, doubles, or unmatched)
    int
    getScore()
    Returns the score generated by the roll, if any
    boolean
    isLose()
    Returns if the roll resulted in an instant loss
    boolean
    isWin()
    Returns if the roll resulted in an instant win
    String
    toString()
    Returns a String detailing the RollResult instance and all of its instance variables.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

      score - The score generated
